Hi. This is what we dream about.

An open space to gather all Techie Communities of SKG Thessaloniki.

It's about time
Thessaloniki got it's
own tech space!

The Lab

Arduinos, Raspberry Pis, soldering irons and bolts!

The Coworking Space

Creativity and zen.

The Lobby

Chill out and relax.

A lot of generic stuff

Specifications

  • In the center of Thessaloniki
  • At least 100m2
  • 3 Major Areas of which one of them should be able to re-purpose for meetup presentations of at least 70 sited people.
  • We'd love to have a meeting room too!
  • A kitchen and a cozy bathroom.

The Budget

This is the subtitle for this particular heading

We'll need 10.000€ for the first year of operations.

And ~7.000€ for each year thereafter.

Checkout our budget spreadsheet on Google Drive.

Checkout the current donations.

The perks

  • 100€ You get a year's worth of space usage.
  • 300€ You'll be the first to get our t-shirts when we print them!
  • 1.000€+ Mega worship and respect! Also known as becoming a sponsor!

F.A.Q.

How will the hackerspace sustain itself?

We'll have the full set of co-working services offered to businesses and professionals, we'll also go for a small bar / refreshments commercial space. But in reality, the bulk of the space's yearly income will be from the member's subscriptions.

Is the Hackerspace for profit?

No, the hackerspace is a non profit entity.

Who is running the hackerspace?

SKGTech along with the meetup communities of our city are the administrative entity. SKGTech is a Non Profit legal entity and will take care of all the accounting and legal work.

What will happen if you don't reach your goal?

There is no reason to be pessimistic about this, as a community, together, we have all the resources required to achieve our goals. However in the unlikely case that the project does not achieve it's goals, all funds will be returned minus any expenses incurred in the meantime.
